actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. Oversight, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To designate the Federal Aviation Administration Technical Center located at the Atlantic City International Airport in Pomona, New Jersey, as the "William J. Hughes Technical Center".

summary.text: Designates the Federal Aviation Administration Technical Center located at the Atlantic City International Airport in Pomona, New Jersey, as the William J. Hughes Technical Center.

titles.title: To designate the Federal Aviation Administration Technical Center located at the Atlantic City International Airport in Pomona, New Jersey, as the "William J. Hughes Technical Center".
